img_summary: The image depicts a formula or recipe document related to the game "Black Myth: Wukong." It is likely associated with the "Evil Repelling Medicament," an uncommon formula that can be purchased from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain. The document appears to be an in-game item used for crafting or obtaining specific benefits.
